Neptune

Physical Characteristics

Type: Ice giant

Diameter: 49,244 km

Orbit Distance: 4.495 billion km (30.07 AU)

Orbital Period: 165 years

Rotation Period: 16 hours

Atmosphere: Primarily hydrogen, helium, and methane

Key Facts

  • Known for its striking blue color due to methane absorption
  • Strongest winds in the solar system, reaching up to 2,100 km/h
  • Has 14 moons, with Triton being the largest and retrograde
  • Temperature: -214°C on average, making it one of the coldest planets
  • Great Dark Spot – a large storm similar to Jupiter's Great Red Spot
  • Unusual axial tilt, causing extreme seasons
